patthana19.15:4.1: Naajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana19.15:5.1: Nabahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana19.15:7.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:8.1: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:9.1: Naajjhattārammaṇañca nabahiddhārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.15:10.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate cha.
